meanings.sent1: The undecorated room had bare walls and no paintings.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the undecorated cake with just a light dusting of powdered sugar.
meanings.sent3: The undecorated tree looked sad without any ornaments for the holidays.
meanings.sent4: Her undecorated speech was powerful in its simplicity, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The undecorated dress was elegant in its minimalism, standing out among the flashy outfits.

meanings.sent1: The undecorated table was made of plain wood with no carvings.
meanings.sent2: He lived in an undecorated house with white walls and basic furniture.
meanings.sent3: The undecorated sandwich was just bread and cheese, nothing fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her undecorated face showed no makeup, just natural beauty.
meanings.sent5: The undecorated landscape stretched out before them, serene in its simplicity.
